message.content:
{"id": "18335", 
"title": "Bug 18335 - Perspective contents lost when view is maximized", 
"description": "", 
"OB": "When a view is maximized in F1, all the contents of the perspective (including other views and layout information) are lost. Only the maximized view is present, while all other views are missing.", 
"EB": "The current implementation of view maximize code replaces the page layout with a temporary layout that only contains the maximized view. This temporary layout is getting persisted instead of the proper layout when the workbench is closed.", 
"SR": "The issue needs to be investigated and fixed so that when a view is maximized, the proper layout with all the views and layout information is retained even after closing and reopening the workbench."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '18335', 'title': 'Bug 18335Perspective contents lost when view is maximized', 'description': '', 'OB': 'Bug 18335Perspective contents lost when view is maximized All the contents of the perspective (views, layout info) is lost when thefollowing actions are performed in F1:Maximize a view in any perspective. Observe that only the maximized view is actually present and all otherviews are missing from the perspective.As far as I can remember, view maximize code replaced the page layout with atemporary one that contained only the maximized view. ', 'EB': 'This temporary layoutmust be getting persisted instead of the proper layout when the workbench isclosed. ', 'SR': ''}
